pageContext.claim: “We had no calls to Russia. We had no calls from Russia, for years. And all of a sudden, we have this great friendship.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did pursue business in Russia. Trump signed a nonbinding agreement in the fall of 2015 to pursue a deal for Trump Tower Moscow. He was continually updated on the project even while he publically denied he didn't have any business ties to Russia. Court documents say the deal was still in progress until just before the Republican National Convention.
